title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Possible answers include:

  • built a wall/made a blockade

  • manned the wall

  • set up/positioned guards/soldiers

  • gathered up/conscripted/drafted/additional/new legions

  • told them no/told them they could not go through the province/told them that they did not have his permission to go through the province.

  • stalled them by postponing or pretending to postpone his decision

  • broke/took down/destroyed/burned/cut off the bridge (student need no specify at Geneva or over the Rhone)

  • he controls the surrounding areas
